headline: PG&E Corp (NYSE:PCG) Reports Mixed Q4 2025 Results, Tightens 2026 Guidance
summary: PG&E reports mixed Q4 2025 results, meeting earnings estimates but missing on revenue. The utility also tightens its 2026 earnings guidance.

headline: PG&E (PCG) Q4 Earnings Match Estimates
summary: PG&E (PCG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -0.47% and -5.66%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: PG&E Posts Lower Profit, Tightens Adj EPS View for Year
summary: PG&E’s fourth-quarter net income fell from a year ago but the California power producer boosted the lower end of its projection for 2026 adjusted earnings.

headline: PG&E: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results matched Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was also for earnings of 36 cents per share. The utility holding company posted revenue of $6.8 billion in the period, which missed Street forecasts.
